name: Easy Roasted Red Pepper & Tomato Soup
description: Warm, bright and inviting, this could be a simple lunch or part of an elegant dinner party. And what can we say; it’s the perfect combo with a grilled cheese sandwich!
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, whisk together tomatoes, Nourish Broth, and Roasted Red Pepper Dip Mix.
Bring to a simmer for 5 minutes.
Season with Salt and Pepper. If desired, garnish with a dollop of sour cream and serve immediately.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!
